title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Drain spaghetti and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth, creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onion, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cooked chicken and cream to the sauce.
Cook for 5 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Fresh vegetables sautéed in a savory soy garlic sauce.
